short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture a screenshot of the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SMArT extension will capture a screenshot of the page you are viewing (only what is viewable on screen) and store it on your computer. It will simultaneously record the timestamp, domain and a hash of the screenshot image to the zksync blockchain.  

This extension is used to archive any screenshot and create a record of when and where it was captured. It is a great way to permanently save something you see on any web site, including social media.
